quotes: Over time, loneliness gets inside you and doesn't go away.
I am not absentminded. It is the presence of mind that makes me unaware of everything else.
We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful.
Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
We become what we believe.
Nothing is easier than fault finding.
Throw your heart over the bar and your body will follow.
The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.
Courage is the willingness to engage in a risk-taking behavior regardless of whether the consequences are unknown or possibly adverse.
Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.
If you cling to a certain thought with dynamic will power, it finally assumes a tangible outward form.
You can, you should, and if you're brave enough to start, you will.
In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
Remain calm. Be kind.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadows.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
It is secondary whether we choose belief or defiance. What is precious is that we are always able to choose.
The best way out is always through.
The idea of ourselves is our escape from the fact of what we really are.
Always show more kindness than seems necessary because the person receiving it needs it more than you will ever know.
Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself.
Logic is like the sword ? those who appeal to it shall perish by it.
You change the world by being yourself.
Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
Truth is the offspring of silence and meditation.
The traveler sees what he sees. The tourist sees what he has come to see.
Freedom lies in being bold.
Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
Everything that is done in the world is done by hope.
All I can do is be me, whoever that is.
I never said it would be easy, I only said it would be worth it.
He who knows best knows how little he knows.
Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
Do good by stealth, and blush to find it fame.
Do something to move yourself toward your major goal every day.
Our anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strengths.
Happiness is only real, when shared.
This is such a short and precious life that it's really important that you don't spend it being unhappy.
A liar knows that he is a liar, but one who speaks mere portions of truth in order to deceive is a craftsman of destruction.
We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
What a book a devil's chaplain might write on the clumsy, wasteful, blundering, low, and horribly cruel work of nature!
Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.
Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win.
Singleness of purpose is one of the chief essentials for success in life, no matter what may be one's aim.
Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn't have the power to say yes.
Sometimes a change of perspective is all it takes to see the light.
If you do not get the chills when you set your goal you're not setting big enough goals.
Be where your enemy is not.
